work.summary: Mathpresso is one of the leading edu-tech software companies in the world offering personalized education platform called 'Qanda' standing for 'Question AND Answer'.
highlights: Implemented backend system of formula calculator suggesting solution line by line automatically
Developed math engine modules like linear equation and rationalization with Python3
Built API converting Latex to image with Node.js

work.summary: Magiceco is the education company offering offline lecture with single board computer like Raspberry-pi, Arduino to students as a service.
highlights: Developed invitation function between users in learning management system
Coded primarily using PHP and Javascript
1+ years of experience in MVC model such as Laravel
Experience in AWS Services like EC2, Route53 and RDS
Designed client-side of the application using PHP, HTML, CSS, Ajax, Json and Jquery

work.summary: Nutragroup is E-commerce company. The company holds an exclusive account as an Amazon marketplace seller which is on Top 200 sellers in the world.
highlights: Built backend system with external APIs analysing price data in PHP
Designed Responsive Web Application in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Jquery and Ajax
Refactored legacy codes and decreased the number of lines by 75% in the main controller
Worked with cross-functional team and familiar with agile build and development process
